trans-unit.source: Install Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows
trans-unit.target: Install Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows to start using Azure Services
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure CLI for Mac, Linux, and Windows to start using Azure Services

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure CLI
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure CLI

trans-unit.source: This document describes how to install the Azure Command-Line Interface (Azure CLI).
trans-unit.target: This document describes how to install the Azure Command-Line Interface (Azure CLI).

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI provides a set of open source shell-based commands for managing resources on Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI provides a set of open source shell-based commands for managing resources on Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.

trans-unit.source: REMARQUE] If you've already installed the Azure CLI, connect it with your Azure resources.
trans-unit.target: REMARQUE] If you've already installed the Azure CLI, connect it with your Azure resources.

trans-unit.source: For more, see <link><linkText>How to connect to your Azure Subscription</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more, see <link><linkText>How to connect to your Azure Subscription</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: The Azure CLI is written in JavaScript, and requires <link><linkText>Node.js</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The Azure CLI is written in JavaScript, and requires <link><linkText>Node.js</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: It is implemented using the <link><linkText>Azure SDK for Node</linkText><title></title></link>, and released under an Apache 2.0 license.
trans-unit.target: It is implemented using the <link><linkText>Azure SDK for Node</linkText><title></title></link>, and released under an Apache 2.0 license.

trans-unit.source: The project repository is located at <link><linkText>https://github.com/azure/azure-xplat-cli</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The project repository is located at <link><linkText>https://github.com/azure/azure-xplat-cli</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: How to install the Azure CLI
trans-unit.target: How to install the Azure CLI

trans-unit.source: There are few ways to install the Azure CLI.
trans-unit.target: There are few ways to install the Azure CLI.

trans-unit.source: Using an installer
trans-unit.target: Using an installer

trans-unit.source: Installing Node.js and npm and then using the npm install command
trans-unit.target: Installing Node.js and npm and then using the npm install command

trans-unit.source: Run Azure CLI as a Docker container
trans-unit.target: Run Azure CLI as a Docker container

trans-unit.source: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line interface (Bash, Terminal, Command prompt) to access the Azure CLI commands.
trans-unit.target: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line interface (Bash, Terminal, Command prompt) to access the Azure CLI commands.

trans-unit.source: Using an installer
trans-unit.target: Using an installer

trans-unit.source: The following installer packages are available:
trans-unit.target: The following installer packages are available:

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Linux installer[linux-installer]</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Installing and using Node.js and npm
trans-unit.target: Installing and using Node.js and npm

trans-unit.source: If Node.js is already installed on your system, use the following command to install the Azure CLI:
trans-unit.target: If Node.js is already installed on your system, use the following command to install the Azure CLI:

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.

trans-unit.source: REMARQUE] On Linux distributions, you may need to use sudo to successfully run the npm command.
trans-unit.target: REMARQUE] On Linux distributions, you may need to use sudo to successfully run the npm command.

trans-unit.source: Installing node.js and npm on Linux distributions that use <link><linkText>dpkg</linkText><title></title></link> package management
trans-unit.target: Installing node.js and npm on Linux distributions that use <link><linkText>dpkg</linkText><title></title></link> package management

trans-unit.source: The most common of these distributions use either the advanced packaging tool (apt) or other tools based on the .deb package format.
trans-unit.target: The most common of these distributions use either the advanced packaging tool (apt) or other tools based on the .deb package format.

trans-unit.source: Some examples are Ubuntu and Debian.
trans-unit.target: Some examples are Ubuntu and Debian.

trans-unit.source: Most of the more recent of these distributions require installing nodejs-legacy in order to get a properly configured npm tool to install the Azure CLI.
trans-unit.target: Most of the more recent of these distributions require installing nodejs-legacy in order to get a properly configured npm tool to install the Azure CLI.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows the commands that install npm properly on Ubuntu 14.04.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows the commands that install npm properly on Ubuntu 14.04.

trans-unit.source: Some of the older distributions, such as Ubuntu 12.04, require installing the current binary distribution of node.js.
trans-unit.target: Some of the older distributions, such as Ubuntu 12.04, require installing the current binary distribution of node.js.

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to do that by installing and using curl.
trans-unit.target: The following code shows how to do that by installing and using curl.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.

trans-unit.source: REMARQUE] The commands here are taken from the Joyent installation instructions found <link><linkText>ici</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: REMARQUE] The commands here are taken from the Joyent installation instructions found <link><linkText>ici</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: However, when using sudo as a pipe target, you should always check the scripts that you are installing and validate that they do exactly what you expect before running them through sudo.
trans-unit.target: However, when using sudo as a pipe target, you should always check the scripts that you are installing and validate that they do exactly what you expect before running them through sudo.

trans-unit.source: With great power comes great responsibility.
trans-unit.target: With great power comes great responsibility.

trans-unit.source: Installing node.js and npm on Linux distributions that use <link><linkText>rpm</linkText><title></title></link> package management
trans-unit.target: Installing node.js and npm on Linux distributions that use <link><linkText>rpm</linkText><title></title></link> package management

trans-unit.source: Installing node.js on RPM-based distributions requires enabling the EPEL repository.
trans-unit.target: Installing node.js on RPM-based distributions requires enabling the EPEL repository.

trans-unit.source: Installing node.js and npm on Windows and Mac OS X
trans-unit.target: Installing node.js and npm on Windows and Mac OS X

trans-unit.source: You can install node.js and npm on Windows and OS X using the installers from <link><linkText>Nodejs.org</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You can install node.js and npm on Windows and OS X using the installers from <link><linkText>Nodejs.org</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: You might need to restart the computer to complete the installation.
trans-unit.target: You might need to restart the computer to complete the installation.

trans-unit.source: Check if node and npm was installed properly by opening command prompt and typing
trans-unit.target: Check if node and npm was installed properly by opening command prompt and typing

trans-unit.source: If it shows the version of the npm installed, you can go ahead and install Azure CLI with
trans-unit.target: If it shows the version of the npm installed, you can go ahead and install Azure CLI with

trans-unit.source: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line user interface to access the Azure CLI commands.
trans-unit.target: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line user interface to access the Azure CLI commands.

trans-unit.source: Executing Azure CLI Commands
trans-unit.target: Executing Azure CLI Commands

trans-unit.source: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line user interface (Bash, Terminal, cmd.exe, and so on) to access the Azure CLI commands.
trans-unit.target: Once the Azure CLI has been installed, you will be able to use the azure command from your command-line user interface (Bash, Terminal, cmd.exe, and so on) to access the Azure CLI commands.

trans-unit.source: For example to execute the help command in Windows launch a Command Prompt (cmd.exe) with Administrator privileges:
trans-unit.target: For example to execute the help command in Windows launch a Command Prompt (cmd.exe) with Administrator privileges:

trans-unit.source: Now you are ready!
trans-unit.target: Now you are ready!

trans-unit.source: Next you can connect to your Azure subscription from the Azure CLI and start using the azure commands.
trans-unit.target: Next you can connect to your Azure subscription from the Azure CLI and start using the azure commands.
